attributes.action: Boris Johnson must make Sue Gray's full report public not just the findings
attributes.background:
I would like Boris Johnson to release the full report by Sue Gray, not just the findings.
Failing this, I would like Parliament to put the release to a vote.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Make sure the report into 'partygate' is published in full with the evidence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606960
